casebody.data:
CONNECTICUT NATIONAL MORTGAGE COMPANY v. LISE-LOTTE KNUDSEN ET AL. (14086)

Landau, SchaUer and Hennessy, Js.

Argued November 30 decision released December 19, 1995 Lise-Lotte Knudsen, pro se, the appellant (named defendant), filed a brief. Neil E. Atlas, with whom, on the brief, was Lynne R. Dzilenski, for the appellee (substitute plaintiff). PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed and the case is remanded for the purpose of setting a new sale date.
